title: Halal Hot Dogs
description: Courtney Fahy at Little Bee Books has bought world rights to Susannah Aziz's debut picture book Halal Hot Dogs, illustrated by Parwinder Singh, a story about an Arab-Muslim family who takes turns picking out a special Jummah treat. When it's Musa's turn to pick, he always picks his favorite: halal hot dogs. Publication is planned for summer 2021; Adria Goetz at Martin Literary Management represented the author, and Amanda Hendon at Advocate represented the illustrator.
author: Susannah Aziz
